activities: Moka5, Inc. (“Moka5”) collects the following personal information from users on its website located at www.moka5.com: full name, title, company, number of employees, email address and telephone number, and additional information a user chooses to provide on a form on the website. This information is collected when users contact Moka5 with questions or comments, request and/or receive technical support, use the test drive software. Moka5 uses the personal information collected on its website in accordance with its website privacy policy. Moka5 provides or provides access to Moka5 customers' personally identifiable information to the vendors and service agencies that Moka5 engages to assist Moka5 in performing services on Moka5’s behalf.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
